The Gemara asks why the Mishnah needed t.text: The Gemara brings two traditions of answers to the question why the tana included בו:

tokensOfLine.text: R Yosef answers that the tana of the Mishnah included בו in order to teach the principle of _mitzvah bo yoser m'b'shlucho_

An unnamed amora suggests that the tana.text: The suggestion that בו is to teach a man must see the woman before marrying her presents several problems:

tokensOfLine.text: Isn't that a stira to the Mishnah?
